title: Texas - Say What You Want - the Collection mp3 peaSoup
description:
Texas are a Scottish pop band from Glasgow, Scotland. They were founded by Johnny McElhone (formerly of the bands Altered Images and Hipsway) in 1986 and feature Sharleen Spiteri on lead vocals. Texas made their performing debut in March 1988 at Scotland's University of Dundee. They took their name from the 1984 Wim Wenders movie Paris, Texas.                                                                       	
    1. Say What You Want
    2. Inner Smile - Part One
    3. I Don't Want A Lover
    4. Summer Son
    5. Black Eyed Boy [Live From The Texas Paris Show]
    6. Sleep-With Paul Buchanan
    7. Getaway [Acoustic Version]
    8. Insane [BBC Radio 1 Mary Anne Hobbs Show - May '97]
    9. I'll See It Through
    10. In My Heart
    11. So In Love With You [BBC Radio 1 Live Session - January '94]
    12. Fight The Feeling
    13. Breathless
    14. In Our Lifetime

    16. Halo
    17. Put Your Arms Around Me
